WhatIsContext:
'context' is an app for delivering your voice messages
 to your irreplaceable people after you pass away.
WhatIsContextMobile:
'context' is an app
 for delivering your voice messages
 to your irreplaceable people 
after you pass away.
episode1:
May 2023. 
It was the last Japanese golden week holidays. 
The last moment of my mother, 
who was fighting with cancer for almost six and half years, 
was getting closer day by day.
episode2:
Lying next to her in her room, 
I decided to realize this app 
though it was still in the investigation stage 
at that time.
episode3: Your voice has irreplaceable value and meaning.
episode4:
There are people who wish to hear your voice again 
when you pass away.
episode5: How about saveing your current voice in the app?
episode6:
It is simple. 
You can just pay and set it up when you see the time is coming.
episode7:
Your voice messages are delivered 
to your irreplaceable people even after your death.

appeal1:
Deliver your voice messages directly 
to each of your irreplaceable people.
appeal2:
You can send your voice messages 
to your irreplaceable people 
at when you think is best.
appeal3:
You can register each of your irreplaceable people 
by their email addresses and international phone numbers.
appeal5: Your voice messages are delivered as you set even after your subscription expires for 6 months.
appeal6: Not only voice messages but also photos are possible to be delivered.
appeal7: There is no ads in the app.
detail1:
context will inform the existence of your voice messages to the registered phone numbers and email addresses.

It will send reminders regularly for 90 days by when your voice messages are confirmed to be received.
detail2: You can choose the timing of sending your voice messages by setting a representative sender or sending schedule.
detail3:
You can deliver your voice messages internationally 
without depending on specific chat apps.
detail4:
context uses authentication codes and one time passwords for each phone number and email addreess to authenticate each recipient. 

context uses RCS messages which are harder to eavesdrop than SMS for sending one time password to the phone numbers.
detail5:
The subscription period of context is 6 months even if you canceled within the period.

Your voice setting is still effective for max six months after the subscription expiration.
detail6: You can send photos also with voice messages
detail7: There is no ads in the app so you can concentrate on your recording and listening to your received voice messages.

Flow1detail1:
Subscription is not necessary for recording your voice.
You can save your daily voice until you see the time to send.

You can also upload voice files recorded outside the app.
Recorded voices can be checked anytime in the app.
Flow2detail1:
Start subscription and create contacts when you see the time.
Email addresses and phone numbers of the recipients are necessary for creating contacts.
Flow3detail1:
Set voice datas to send to each recipients.
You can set multiple voice datas to one recipient
and one voice data can be set to multiple recipients.
You can modify and add voice settings until the sending starts.

Please note that one voice sending ticket is necessary for each recipient.
You need to purchase additional tickets according to the number of recipients you set.
One voice sending ticket is included when you start subscription.
Flow4detail1:
You can set following two triggers for starting your voice sending.

  A. Sending by your representative
  B. Schedule send

You can set both triggers, but at least one of them is necessary to set.
Flow5detail1:
You can check the receiving status of each recipient when your voice data sending starts.
It is also possible to stop sending to specific recipients.
If you allow your representative to follow your sending, he or she can also check the receiving status of each recipient.

Please note that he or she can also check the names, email addresses, and phone numbers of each recipients if you allow your representative to follow your sending.
AcceptFlow1detail1:
Notice of voice message will be sent regularly to the email addresses and phone numbers set by the sender when the sending starts.

context uses RCS messages for messages to phone numbers.
AcceptFlow2detail1:
It is necessary to install context app to receive voice messages.
There is not any payment for receiving voice messages.

The official release of context app is scheduled for July 2025.
AcceptFlow3detail1:
Please enter the authentication code written in the voice message notice.

This code is an important information for security so please do not show it to anyone else.
AcceptFlow4detail1:
Please enter the phone number where the voice message notice was sent (the phone number set by the sender).

This process is skipped if the phone number is already linked to the user account.
AcceptFlow5: 5. Enter One Time Password for the phone number
AcceptFlow5Mobile: 5. Enter One Time Password for the phone number
AcceptFlow5detail1:
One Time Password is sent to the phone number if you enter the correct phone number in step 4.

Please note that the One Time Password to the phone number is sent through RCS message. Please set up your phone to receive RCS messages if necessary.
AcceptFlow6detail1:
Please enter the email address where the voice message notice was sent (the email address set by the sender).

This process is skipped if the email address is the same with user account's email address.
AcceptFlow7: 7. Enter One Time Password for the Email
AcceptFlow7Mobile: 7. Enter One Time Password for the Email
AcceptFlow7detail1: One Time Password is sent to the email address if you enter the correct email address in step 6.
AcceptFlow8detail1:
The final confirmation screen is displayed after the authentication is completed.

You can check the sender's name, phone number, email address, and icon.
Please make sure that both of the phone number and email address belongs to the sender.

In context app, both of the sender's email address and phone number must be authenticated with one-time password before sending voice messages.
AcceptFlow9detail1: Downloading of voice messages is started when you select receiving voice messages on the screen in step 8.
context3Auth:
Three authentication stages 
for recipient in context
AuthByCodeDetail: Necessary to enter the authentication code issued when sending starts for receiving the voice message.
AuthByTelDetail: Necessary to enter the phone number set by the sender and the one-time password for receiving the voice message.
AuthByEmailDetail: Necessary to enter the email address set by the sender and the one-time password sent to the email address for receiving the voice message.
AuthByEmailDetailMedium: Necessary to enter the email address set by the sender and the one-time password for receiving the voice message.
RCSMessageAppeal: Uses RCS messages instead of old SMS for messages to phone numbers
SMSDangerAppeal: SMS intercept is relatively easy except in some countries such as Japan
contextUseRCS: In context app, all messages to phone numbers are sent through RCS messages.
HardToCheat: It is very difficult to eavesdrop both RCS messages to phone numbers and email addresses at the same time
RCSMessageAppealMedium:
Uses RCS messages 
instead of old SMS 
for messages to phone numbers
SMSDangerAppealMedium: SMS intercept is relatively easy except in some countries such as Japan
contextUseRCSMedium: In context app, all messages to phone numbers are sent through RCS messages.
HardToCheatMedium: It is very difficult to eavesdrop both RCS messages to phone numbers and email addresses at the same time

PrivacyPolicyStart: context Inc. (hereinafter referred to as 'the Company') is committed to the careful protection of all personal information used in the execution of the voice message service context. To ensure this, the Company establishes the following Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as 'this Policy').
PP1: The Company collects, uses, and provides personal information necessary for the execution of its services.
PP2: The Company does not handle personal information beyond the necessary scope of service execution.
PP3: The Company implements measures to prevent and rectify the leakage, loss, or damage of personal information.
PP4: Unless consent is obtained from the individual or permitted by law, the Company does not provide personal information to third parties.
PP5: When outsourcing the handling of personal information, the Company supervises the service provider to ensure that personal information is protected in the same manner as the Company.
PP6: If a user requests the suspension or deletion (hereinafter 'Suspension of Use') of their personal information for the following reasons, the Company will promptly investigate after confirming the request from the user and take appropriate action.
PP7: For inquiries regarding opinions, questions, complaints, or other concerns related to this Privacy Policy, please contact the following email address.
PP8: The Company is committed to the continuous improvement of its personal information protection management system.
PPA: The personal information is handled beyond the scope of the previously disclosed purpose of use.
PPB: The personal information was obtained through deception or other improper means.
PrivacyPolicyEnd:
context Inc.
Representative Director: Kengo Matsumoto
SubscriptionExplanation:
Please select a plan according to the total time of the voice data you send.
One voice sending ticket is included when you start subscription.
SubscriptionTicketExplanation: ※The above prices may change due to fluctuations in exchange rates and other factors.
VoiceTicketExplanation: One voice sending ticket is necessary for each recipient.
PicTicketExplanation: One photo sending ticket is necessary for every 20 photos.
OtpNotArrive: Cannot receive the one-time password email.
OtpNotArriveAnswer:
please check the following points if you cannot receive the one-time password email:

1. Please check if correct email address is entered.

2. Please check if it has been sorted into the spam folder.

3. Please add context-voice.jp domain to your allow list of email setting.

4. There may be delays or outages in the email server, so please check again later.
RcsNotArriveAnswer:
RCSメッセージが受信できない場合は、以下の点をご確認下さい。

1. RCSメッセージを受信できるように設定されているか、ご確認下さい。

2. RCSメッセージを受信できるアプリ（日本国内のお客様でしたら、プラスメッセージや楽天リンクなど）をインストールしているか、ご確認下さい。

3. 電話番号が正しく入力されているか、ご確認下さい。

4. 電話番号のキャリアがRCSメッセージに対応しているか、ご確認下さい。

5. 電話番号のキャリアの障害や遅延が発生している可能性もありますので、しばらく時間をおいてから再度ご確認下さい。

Please check the following points: 

1. Please check it your mobile is set to be able to receive RCS messages.

2. Please check if you have installed an app that can receive RCS messages (such as Plus Message or Rakuten Link for customers in Japan).

3. Please check if your phone number is entered correctly.

4. Please check if the carrier of the phone number supports RCS messages.

5. There may be delays or outages in the carrier's service, so please check again later.
EndToEnd: contextは、エンドツーエンドの暗号化に対応していますか？
EndToEndAnswer:
現時点ではまだ、contextは、エンドツーエンドの暗号化には対応しておりません。

contextでは、お客様からお預かりするデータを全て暗号化して保存しますが、リアルタイムでのコミュニケーションツールではないこともあり、エンドツーエンドの暗号化に現状対応出来ておりません。

プライバシーポリシーに記載しました通り、contextでは、お客様の個人情報の保管に最大限の注意を払うと共に、日々セキュリティの強化に努めて参ります。
一方で、金銭に関する情報の送信につきましては、contextの仕組みをご理解頂いた上で、お客様判断でご利用頂けますよう、お願い申し上げます。
AboutDemo: 音声メッセージの受け取りのデモをすることは可能ですか？
AboutDemoAnswer:
サブスクリプションの開始と音声送信チケットが1枚必要となりますが、デモを行うこと自体は可能です。

連絡先にお客様のアカウントのメールアドレスと電話番号を設定して頂ければ、
ご自身のアカウント宛てに音声メッセージを送信し、ご自身で受け取ることができます。
AboutRepresentativeAuth: 代理送信者の認証はどのように行いますか？
AboutRepresentativeAuthAnswer:
代理送信者の認証フローは、音声メッセージ受け取り時の認証フローと同様です。

代理送信者の依頼の有効期限は、依頼後30日間です。
AboutAuthLimitTime: 音声メッセージ送信開始後、受け取りに期限はありますか？
AboutAuthLimitTimeAnswer:
音声メッセージの受け取り期限は、音声メッセージ送信開始後、90日間です。

90日間の間に受け取りがなかった場合は、音声メッセージは削除されます。
AboutSenderInfo: contextの音声メッセージの送信者情報の信頼性は高いと考えて良いでしょうか？
AboutSenderInfoAnswer:
信頼性は高いと考えて頂いて良いです。

contextでは、サブスクリプション開始時に、お客様に電話番号認証を行って頂きます。(メールアドレスは最初のログイン時に認証します。)

contextでは電話番号が未認証の状態では、音声メッセージの送信が出来ないようになっています。
SenderInfoAppeal2: context requires phone number authentication for the sender also
SenderInfoAppeal3: It is impossible to send voice messages without phone number authentication in context app.
